name: Tools Of The Trade
body:

### Monetization

FGL is a great place to find a sponsor for your web game or a publisher for your mobile game

https://fgl.com/

Game bundles are a big thing now, the most famous one is the humble bundle, that was the original

https://www.humblebundle.com/
